STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() if ObjectDC():Get_CardPtr(1) ~= nil then filter:SetCardInstance(ObjectDC():Get_CardPtr(1)) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) end filter:AddCardName( "GHOSTFIRE" ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_NAMES ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_SORCERY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_INSTANT ) Object():Protection()

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: if (TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_INSTANT ) ~= 0 or TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_SORCERY ) ~= 0) then ObjectDC():Set_CardPtr(1, TriggerObject()) ObjectDC():Protect_CardPtr(1) return true else return false end
if TriggerObject() == ObjectDC():Get_CardPtr(1) then ObjectDC():Set_CardPtr(1, nil) return true else return false end

return ( SecondaryObject():GetZone() == ZONE_STACK and SecondaryObject():WasCast() ~= 0 and (SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_WHITE ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLUE ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLACK ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_RED ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_GREEN ) ~= 0))

return ( SecondaryObject():GetZone() ~= ZONE_IN_PLAY and SecondaryObject():GetSubType():Test( ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_AURA ) ~= 0 and (SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_WHITE ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLUE ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLACK ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_RED ) ~= 0 or SecondaryObject():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_GREEN ) ~= 0))

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local defendingPlayer = Object():GetPlayerAttacked() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_PLANESWALKER ) filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( defendingPlayer ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, defendingPlayer ) local numberOfTargets = filter:CountStopAt( 6 ) if numberOfTargets > 0 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetCount( numberOfTargets ) defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_ONE_OF_SIX" )
if numberOfTargets > 1 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 1, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TWO_OF_SIX" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 2 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 2, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_THREE_OF_SIX" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 3 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 3, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_FOUR_OF_SIX" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 4 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 4, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_FIVE_OF_SIX" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 5 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 5, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_SIX_OF_SIX" ) end
defendingPlayer:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) end

local target_array = {} for i=0,5 do target_array[i] = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_NthCardPtr(i) end for i=0,5 do if target_array[i] ~= nil then local player = target_array[i]:GetPlayer() target_array[i]:Sacrifice(player) end end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Quando Emrakul viene messo in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, il suo proprietario rimescola il suo cimitero nel suo grimorio.
Wenn Emrakul von irgendwoher auf den Friedhof gelegt wird, mischt sein Besitzer seinen Friedhof in seine Bibliothek.
Quand Emrakul est mis dans un cimetière depuis n'importe où, son propriétaire mélange son cimetière à sa bibliothèque.
Cuando Emrakul vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte, su propietario baraja su cementerio en su biblioteca.
引き裂かれし永劫、エムラクールがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、オーナーは自分の墓地を自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Когда Эмракул попадает откуда-либо на кладбище, его владелец втасовывает свое кладбище в свою библиотеку.
Quando Emrakul é colocado num cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, seu dono embaralha seu próprio cemitério em seu próprio grimório.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local owner = Object():GetOwner() if (owner ~= nil) then owner:MoveLocalZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) owner:ShuffleLibrary() end
